elements.name: x-base
elements.description: A base template you can install into your own project as a starting point. This one includes the Tailwind CDN for quick prototyping.

elements.name: x-form
elements.description: This component provides a form element that will post by default and includes the csrf token out of the box.

elements.name: x-input
elements.description: A versatile input component that will render labels and validation errors automatically.

elements.name: x-submit
elements.description: A submit button component that prefills with a "Submit" label.

elements.name: x-csrf-token
elements.description: Includes the CSRF token in a form.

elements.name: x-icon
elements.description: This component provides the ability to inject any icon from the Iconify project in your templates.

elements.name: x-vite-tags
elements.description: Tempest has built-in support for Vite, the most popular front-end development server and build tool. This component simply inject registered entrypoints where it is called.

attributes.name: :if
attributes.description: Conditional attribute `if`. The element is present in the final html when the condition is true.

attributes.name: :elseif
attributes.description: Conditional attribute `else if`. The element is present in the final html when the condition is true.

attributes.name: :else
attributes.description: Conditional attribute. The element is present in the final html otherwise.

attributes.name: :foreach
attributes.description: Loop attribute `for each`. Values should be as PHP `foreach` loop. Introduce a local variable for each value in the collection.

attributes.name: :forelse
attributes.description: Loop attribute combined with `foreach`. The element is present in the final html when the collection is empty.
